main.name: Rosie Zhao
main.bio: I'm currently completing my bachelor's degree in mathematics and computer science at McGill University. My fields of interest include abstract algebra, natural language processing, and machine learning theory. I'm a lover of nature, dessert, board games, graphic design, ultimate, and puns! In fact, I had an argument with my friend about the shape of a coffee cup today⁠— it almost torus apart. I owe them a topology, I honestly donut know what came over me...
